name: Evan Craft
description: '''Evan Kenneth Craft''' (born April 8, 1991) is an American [[Contemporary worship music]] singer. Craft has recorded albums in Spanish and English. His second studio album, ''[[Yo Soy Segundo]]'', peaked at number 10 on the [[Latin Pop Albums]] chart and at number 30 on the [[Top Latin Albums]] chart. Craft has been nominated for multiple awards.
